sections.title: About Me
sections.content: I’m Oburu Ephraim — a software engineer, data analyst, and tech entrepreneur passionate about building practical, scalable digital solutions. I specialize in full-stack web development, robust database systems, and GIS-integrated platforms. I also help individuals and teams gain real-world tech skills through mentorship, training, and collaborative projects. Whether you're building a startup, upskilling in software, or seeking tailored data solutions — I deliver tools that work and empower.

sections.title: Let's Work Together
sections.content: Need a website, a database system, or a complete digital solution? Looking to skill up, start a tech project, or need help guiding a team through development? Whether you're a solo learner, a startup, or an enterprise — I offer hands-on collaboration, mentorship, and custom system design. Let’s build smart, sustainable, and impactful solutions together.

accordion.title: Software Development Expertise
accordion.content:
• Scalable Systems: I architect and develop scalable web applications tailored for performance and future growth.
  • Efficient Database Design: I build well-structured, secure databases optimized for speed, integrity, and multi-user collaboration.
  • Custom Websites: I design and deploy professional websites for businesses, institutions, and individuals — aligned to your brand and purpose.

accordion.title: Data Analysis and Visualization Proficiency
accordion.content:
• Capacity Building: I mentor students, professionals, and teams to unlock the power of data and modern analytics tools.
  • Insightful Analysis: I transform raw data into actionable insights using statistical and machine learning techniques.
  • Engaging Visuals: I design dashboards, charts, and geospatial visuals that clearly communicate the story behind your data.

accordion.title: Portfolio Development
accordion.content: I craft visually striking and content-rich digital portfolios tailored to developers, professionals, and creatives. I also guide learners and teams on how to package their own projects into compelling portfolios that win attention and trust.
